title: sannidiyE
sahitya:
sannidiyE sadA vENDinEn mAtAnin 
unniru tAL tozhum unnada varam tanda

anupallavi

kaNNimai enakkAkum kAmAkshi umaiyE! 
eNNamellAm Ezhisai inba nilaiyE 

caraNam

tAmarai malarum nANiDumvadani 
tEmadura vaak vilAsinI! 
nEmamuDan vundan nAmandanaiyE 
yAmanudinam pADum paravasa nilai tanda priyadarshini
